The article claiming that President Obam: In God We Trust" from U.S. currency was published by the National Report, a website known for publishing fake news stories.
The claim contradicts legislation passed: which makes the appearance of the motto "In God We Trust" mandatory on all U.S. coins and paper currency.
The claim includes quotes attributed to: stating that the currency adjustment is necessary due to the diversity of religious beliefs in the country. However, these quotes are fabricated as part of the fictional article.
